title.rendered: Daxin DX-1020 Non-Contact Infrared Medical Thermometer

content.rendered:
Key Specifications/Special Features:

  • About products:
    • DX-10220 is held non-contact infrared body thermometer
    • Two measurement modes: body temperature and surface temperature
    • Can store 34 body temperature digits, and alarm for higher or low body temperature
  • Actions: different temperature ranges have different backlights, auto power-off
  • Features:
    • Precise non-contact measurements
    • Built-in laser pointer
    • °C/°F switchable button
    • Automatic selection range and resolution to 0.10 or 10
    • Data hold and auto power-off
    • Set alarm value (the alarm threshold default value is 38°C (100.4°F)
    • Backlight LCD display
    • Memorization of the last 34 measurements
  • Specifications:
    • Ranges:
      • Body temperature: 32 to 43°C (90 to 104°F)
      • Surface temperature：0 to 100°C (32 to 212°F)
    • Accuracy:
      • Body temperature：±0.3°C (±0.6°F)
      • Surface temperature：±1°C (±1.8°F)
      • Measuring distance: 5 to 15cm
      • Response time: 0.5s
      • Auto power-off: 7s
      • Resolution: 0.1°C (0.1°F)
      • Normal conditions of use:
      • Store temperature: -10 to 60°C (14 to 140°F)
      • Operating temperature: 10 to 40°C (50 to 104°F)
    • Power supply: 9V battery
    • Weight: 122g
    • Size: 145 x 80 x 40mm
    • Accessories: battery, carrying case, operation manual
